S02ekmuhr_u:0_1: ñ1.1 evaṃ mayā śru[tam eka{smin}?] samaye bhagavāṃ cchrāvastyāṃ viharati sma,
S02ekmuhr_u:0_3: ñ1.2 atha khalv āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisa[ttvo] mahāsattvo 'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasaha[sreṇa] parivṛto yena bhagavāṃs tenopasamakrāmad
S02ekmuhr_u:0_4: ñ1.3 upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā
S02ekmuhr_u:0_6: ñ1.4 idaṃ mama bhagavann ekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayam ekādaśabhi[x] [kalpako]ṭībhir bhāṣitam /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_7: ñ1.5 ahaṃ caitarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarva[sattvānā]m arthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśa[ma]nāya{ḥ} sarvapāpālakṣmīduḥsvapnapratinivāraṇāya sarvākālamṛtyupratinivāraṇāya aprasādānāṃ prasādanāya sarvavighnavināyakānāṃ praśamanāya /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_9: ñ1.6 nā[haṃ] bhagava(n/t) samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyā[ḥ] prajāyā,
S02ekmuhr_u:0_10: yad anena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣadūṣaṇe kṛte yaḥ kaś cid atikrame[n] na praśame[n],
S02ekmuhr_u:0_12: nedaṃ [sthā]na[ṃ] vidyate; sthāpya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyat[e] tad asya ca kalpayato 'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_15: ñ1.9 smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavaṃ gaṅgānadībālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍāpratihatasaṅgavelāmarājā nāma tathāgata{ta}sya{ā} /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_19: ñ1.10 mayā tathāgatasyānti[ke] anuśrutenāyaṃ hṛdayam udgṛhītaṃ / saha pratilaṃbhe[na] daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatā[ḥ] sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_22: ñ1.11 evaṃ bahukaro 'yaṃ mā--ill*hṛdayaṃ tasmāt tarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavya{ṇa}m /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_24: ñ1.12 kālyam utthāya aṣṭo[t]taraṃ vāraśataṃ pravartayitavyam /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_34: ñ1.20 [6] na viṣaṃ na garam na jvaraṃ na śastram kāye kramiṣyati /
S02ekmuhr_u:0_37: ñ1.23 [9] nākālamṛtyunā kālaṃ kariṣyati / %NB number 10 seems to be missing,
S02ekmuhr_u:0_39: or a different counting is required
S02ekmuhr_u:0_44: ñ1.28 [4] itaś c[y]utaḥ sukhāvatyāṃ lokadhātāv upapatsyate
S02ekmuhr_u:1_0: smarāmy ahaṃ bhagavann it daśānāṃ gaṅgānadībāl[u]kāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato 'bhūt{a} /
S02ekmuhr_u:1_3: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sarvabuddhānāṃ karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pra[tila]bdham /
S02ekmuhr_u:1_5: yena bandhanabaddhā ye vadhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatā[ḥ] tad anenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇam śaraṇam parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi yat
S02ekmuhr_u:1_6: sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānām anayā hṛdayeṇā karṣitvā maitracittā[n] dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
S02ekmuhr_u:1_9: evaṃ mahārthiko 'yaṃ mama bhagavat hṛ[dayam] ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā catvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣa[yaṃ] gacchanti
S02ekmuhr_u:1_13: % Dutt supplies ``teṣāṃ ye'' but better understand:
S02ekmuhr_u:1_14: ``why say more, these will happen as they are taught''
S02ekmuhr_u:2_1: aneka-buddha-śata-sahasra-avaropita-kuśala-mūlā bhaviṣyanti ye śroṣyanti prāk- eva japa-sādhana-ādibhiḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:2_4: ye ca caturdaśīpañcadaśī mām- uddiśya- upavasante
S02ekmuhr_u:2_14: sādhu sādhu kula-putra yat te sarva-sattvānām- antike- evam-rūpā
S02ekmuhr_u:2_16: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kula-putra anena- upāyena {sarva}sarva-sattvānā[m- anuttarā]yāṃ samyak-saṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum /
S02ekmuhr_u:2_21: tatra khalu- āryāvalokiteśvaras- bodhisattvo utthāya- āsanāt- eka-aṃsam- uttara-āsaṅgam- kṛtvā bhagavatas- caraṇayos- praṇipatya{m} idam- hṛdayam- āvartayati sma /
S02ekmuhr_u:4_2: dhuru dhuru / iṭṭe viṭṭe / cale cale / pracale pracale / [kusume] kusumavare /
S02ekmuhr_u:5_2: tat- yathā ha ha ha ha / ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:6_2: tat- yathā ṭuru ṭuru ha ha ha ha svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:7_2: tat- yathā siri siri dhiri dhiri siri dhiri
S02ekmuhr_u:8_2: tat- yathā sāde sāde / sidi sidi / sudu sudu svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:9_2: tat- yathā masiddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ suru agnim- prajvālya dadhi-madhu-ghṛta-abhyaktānām- ahorātra-uṣitena- ekena triṃśatā homa[s-] kāryaḥ /
S02ekmuhr_u:10_2: tat- yathā ili mili pili tili / tili hili svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:10_3: diśābandhas- udakena sarṣapair vā bhasmanā vā sapta-jāpena /
S02ekmuhr_u:11_2: tat- yathā piṭi piṭi tiṭi tiṭi /
S02ekmuhr_u:11_3: viṭi viṭi gaccha gaccha bhagavan- āryāvalokiteśvara sva-bhavanam- sva-bhavanam- svāhā /
S02ekmuhr_u:12_0: end of hayagrīvāvidyā folio a different hand adds:
S02ekmuhr_u:13_0: oṃ namo ratnatrāyāyaḥ namaś caṇḍavajrapāṇa{ā}ye mahāśaktasenāpa[ta]ye .
S02ekmuhr_u:13_1: tad yathā ugrāya svāhā // ati ugrāya svāhā // ugrapriyāya svāhā ugrapriyāya svāhā .
